mdx.excerpt: Like many other software developers, I work on the same web app every day. I have to open up my project directory in VS Code, run my serverâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Automate Your Dev Environment with Git Bash for Windows
frontmatter.description: Do you have a project you work on all the time? Learn how to use one simple command to open your project in VS Code, run your server, and open up an incognito window in Google Chrome.
